articles.author: DNA Web Team
articles.title: All about 'Cooper', Australia's largest dinosaur which is a new species - DNA India
articles.description: The new species of dinosaur Australotitan cooperensis is part of the titanosaur family that lived about 100 million years ago in S America and Asia.
